name: List of Rituals
description: Some simpler $(thing)Rituals$() will be available to you when you have a Tier III $(l:bloodmagic:altar/blood_altar)Blood Altar$(), but the more advanced ones will require $(dusk)Dusk Runes$(), and thus a Tier IV Altar. $(br2)Use a $(l:bloodmagic:rituals/ritual_diviner)Ritual Diviner$() to assemble the rituals, an $(l:bloodmagic:rituals/activation_crystals)Activation Crystal$() to activate them, and a $(l:bloodmagic:rituals/ritual_tinkerer)Ritual Tinkerer$() to fine-tune them. Don't forget to keep your $(l:bloodmagic:altar/soul_network)Soul Network$() topped off!
